data for state of Iowa, compiled by the Iowa Geological and Water Survey and provided by Illinois State Geological Survey. Iowa Bedrock Depth Dataset is published as a Web feature service, a web map service, and an ESRI service for the National Geothermal Data System. For more information on these data see links provided. </gco:CharacterString> </gmd:abstract> <gmd:status> <gmd:MD_ProgressCode
